definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: Design of multi-channel audio retrieval system based on melody;
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種多聲道超聲氣體流量計的電路設計。

sentences.english: Methane gas feeding panel complete with flowmeter with adjusting tap and pressure gauge.
sentences.chinese: 甲烷氣輸出板配有能調節活栓及壓力錶的流量計。

sentences.english: The acoustic principle of detecting flowrate and the level of material by ultrasonic is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹超聲波流量計與物位計的聲學原理。

sentences.english: This paper presents the electrocircuit design of a multi-path ultrasonic gas flowmeter.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種多聲道超聲氣體流量計的電路設計。

sentences.english: Vortex flowmeter is one of the most widely used flow measurement devices.
sentences.chinese: 渦街流量計是最爲常用的流量測量裝置之一。

sentences.english: This will result in a very compact flowmeter.
sentences.chinese: 這將導致非常緊湊的流量計。

sentences.english: The driving system is an important part of Coriolis mass flow meter.
sentences.chinese: 驅動系統是科里奧利質量流量計的重要組成部分之一。

sentences.english: Electric Fuel Pump, Air-Flow Meter, Sensor, Switch.
sentences.chinese: 電動燃油泵，空氣流量計，傳感器，開關。

sentences.english: Here MFM means thermal Mass Flow Meter.
sentences.chinese: 本手冊所指的爲量熱式質量流量計。

sentences.english: Application of Verabav Flowmeter in the Test System of Xiangtan Iron & Steel Co.
sentences.chinese: 威力巴流量計在湘鋼檢測系統的應用。

sentences.english: A new gravity-flow meter under controlling of a single chip computer is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了單片機控制下的一種新型重量式流量計。

sentences.english: The paper is a good reference to model selection of flowmeters.
sentences.chinese: 爲流量計的選型提供了可靠的參考價值。

sentences.english: Okiya Group Co. , Ltd. Producing turbocharger, filter, air flow sensor.
sentences.chinese: 生產增壓器，濾清器，空汽流量計。

sentences.english: If the screen pack or pipe has the damage can ravel flowmeter check, remove impurities.
sentences.chinese: 若過濾網或管道有損壞可拆開流量計檢查，去除雜質。

sentences.english: Aplication of Thermal Gas Mass Flowmeter in Gas Electrical machine.
sentences.chinese: 熱式氣體質量流量計在氣體發電機組中的應用。

sentences.english: It is usual to provide a flowmeter at the column outlet .
sentences.chinese: 在柱子出口處常常要安裝一個流量計。

definition: toss a peach, get back a plum (idiom); to return a favor/to exchange gifts/Scratch my back, and I'll scratch yours.
(jocularly) public building that has been lying idle (and is thus ideal for housing mosquitos) (Tw)
number in a sequence/ordinal number/serial number
to postpone one's graduation (e.g. by undertaking additional studies) (abbr. for 延後畢業|延后毕业[yan2 hou4 bi4 ye4])
